data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Grangeiro, Daniela C., Souza, Leila A., Christoffersen, Martin L. (2017): New species of Xiphoniscus and new record of Androdeloscia escalonai (Isopoda, Scutocoxifera, Oniscidea, Philosciidae) from Brazilian Amazon. Zootaxa 4350 (2), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4350.2.11|7 occurrences
